item.title: Custom CMS & CRM Engine
item.description: The Problem The client, a mid-sized e-commerce operation, had outgrown their off-the-shelf CRM system. Data synchronization was taking too long, database deadlocks were causing sporadic 502 errors during peak load, and feature development had ground to a halt due to crippling technical debt. The business required an alternative that was fast, strongly typed, and entirely owned by them. The Solution I designed and implemented a bespoke CMS and CRM engine from scratch using .
